document.masterDocTitle: Occurrence of a new species of Letana (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Phaneropterinae) in India

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Occurrence of a new species of Letana (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Phaneropterinae) in India

subSubSection.paragraph: Description. Male: medium sized parapterous, green species with slightly maculated tegmina; pronotum slightly inflate; stridulatory field length 2.20 mm and width 1.55mm ; hind wing 6–7mm longer than tegmina; stridulatory file small, anterior margins to posterior margins slightly curved with comparatively large pegs in posterior half with about 145 teeth; 9 th tergite rather weakly projecting behind, apex broadly rounded; supra-anal plate shallowly grooved in the middle, apex with semi-circular incision between the sub-truncate medial part and the protruding apico-lateral angle; cerci slightly arcuate with a baso-internal bump, internal margins with a black marked dilation from basal fourth to apex; subgenital plate lateral lobes with apical part widening apically, apex obliquely sub-truncate; phallus sclerite small, elongate, connected with phallus by membrane.

subSubSection.paragraph:
PLATE IV.
L. atomifera
male 1–8 : 1 . Dorsal view of stridulatory file; 2 . Mirror on right tegmina; 3 . Ventral view of stridulatory file on left tegmina; 4 . Lateral view of genitalia; 5 . Left cerci; 6 . Ventral view of subgenitalia plate; 7 . Dorsal view of phallus sclerite; 8 . Lateral view of phallus sclerite. female 9–12 : 9 . Lateral view of ovipositor; 10 . Dorsal view of supra anal plate; 11 . Ventral view of subgenitalia plate; 12 . Lateral view of cerci.
L. inflata
female 13–15 : 13 . Lateral view of ovipositor; 14 . Ventral view of subgenitalia plate; 15 . Lateral view of cerci.

PLATE VI.
L. rufonatata male 1–7 : 1 . Ventral view of stridulatory file; 2 . Dorsal view of stridulatory file; 3 . Right cerci; 4 . Ninth tergite; 5 . Ventral view of subgenitalia plate; 7 . Dorsal view of phallus sclerite. Female 8–9 : 8 . Lateral view of ovipositor; 9 . Ventral view of subgenitalia plate.
